column5: Planning a trip to lac LaRonge next June 1st. Any info or help on fishing there would be greatly appreciated. Thanks...

Lac la Ronge is a big lake. Make sure you get a guide, at that time of the year you can expect 30-100 walleye a day at Pickeral Bay. As well the lake trout shoud be shallow so you will be able to troll for them near the surface. Five years ago we got a guide in English Bay and caught tons of walleye and lots of lakers. You will have a great time.
